'''Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials''' are [[Character Development Item]]s that are used to ascend [[Character]]s and [[Weapon]]s once they have reached their maximum level. These materials can be grouped by the family or type of monster that drops them. Higher-quality materials can also be [[craft]]ed with [[Alchemy]] by combining lower-quality materials from the same group.

==General Enemy Drops==
Items in this group can be found by defeating [[Common Enemies]] and some [[Elite Enemies]]. They have a quality of 1-3 stars and are essential for character and weapon ascension as well as talent leveling.
* In Character Ascension, these items are used along with [[Character Ascension Material]]s and [[Local Specialties]].
* In Weapon Ascension, these items are used along with materials from [[Elite Enemy Drops]] and [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s.
* In Talent Upgrading, these items are used along with [[Character Talent Material]]s.

==Elite Enemy Drops==
Items in this group can be found by defeating [[Elite Enemies]]. They have a quality of 2-4 stars and are used in weapon ascension by using it along with materials from [[General Enemy Drops]] and [[Weapon Ascension Material]].
